name: part_007
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ生誕ライブ】ゲストいっぱい！誕生日LIVE【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [hEkHj1WZekU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC segment with Yukihana Lamy, Momosuzu Nene, Omaru Polka, and Shishiro Botan discussing the stage and preparing for the next song.
NePoLaBo performs 'secret base ～君がくれたもの～' (secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~).

subtitles.original: あなたの所だからここ
subtitles.english: This is your place.

subtitles.original: すごいね、でもえっこんな感じで改装してくれたの？ラミィ
subtitles.english: Amazing. But did you renovate it like this, Lamy?

subtitles.original: 改装…改装したわけじゃないけど、なんかもう消すものを消してみて…
subtitles.english: Renovated... it's not like I renovated it, but I just removed things that needed to be removed...

subtitles.original: なるほどね
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: そして電気を、電気を消すだけで…
subtitles.english: And just by turning off the lights...

subtitles.original: 断捨離、断捨離
subtitles.english: Decluttering, decluttering.

subtitles.original: 電気をね、消して…明日からボロ隠しが目立つようになります
subtitles.english: Turning off the lights... from tomorrow, the wear and tear will stand out.

subtitles.original: いい雰囲気にしました。ありがとうございます、綺麗にしてくださって
subtitles.english: I made a nice atmosphere. Thank you for making it beautiful.

subtitles.original: えっ、ここに何をするんだい？
subtitles.english: Eh, what are we going to do here?

subtitles.original: ここで、うん、四人で
subtitles.english: Here, yeah, with the four of us.

subtitles.original: えっ？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: まあそうだよな
subtitles.english: Well, that's right.

subtitles.original: 初めて、はい、歌を歌いたいなと思います
subtitles.english: For the first time, yes, I'd like us to sing a song.

subtitles.original: やったー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Hooray! Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ初めてね、四人で歌う歌ね
subtitles.english: So, for the first time, a song the four of us sing.

subtitles.original: 記念だしな。何歌うの？何歌うの？
subtitles.english: It's a commemoration. What are we singing? What are we singing?

subtitles.original: えっとね、みんなが好きな歌で
subtitles.english: Well, it's a song that everyone likes.

subtitles.original: ラミィたちがデビューしたのは何月ですか？はい、ねねさん
subtitles.english: What month did Lamy and the others debut? Yes, Nene-san.

subtitles.original: 八月であります！
subtitles.english: It's August!

subtitles.original: ピンポン！正解であります！
subtitles.english: Ding-dong! Correct!

subtitles.original: そう、八月が関係している歌をみんなでね、歌っていきたいなと
subtitles.english: Yes, I want us all to sing a song related to August.

subtitles.original: 何だろう？えっ、みんな知ってる曲かな？
subtitles.english: I wonder what it is? Eh, is it a song everyone knows?

subtitles.original: えっ、みんな知ってる。好きよ、好きだと思う。好きか？
subtitles.english: Eh, everyone knows it. You'll like it, I think you'll like it. Do you?

subtitles.original: じゃあ俺じゃダメか？ダメか…
subtitles.english: Then, is it no good if it's "ore"? No good...

subtitles.original: 俺でいいか？
subtitles.english: Is "ore" okay?

subtitles.original: おまえらに届けるぜ
subtitles.english: I'll deliver it to you guys!

subtitles.original: 歌声、俺たちの歌声届けるぜ
subtitles.english: Our singing voice, we'll deliver our singing voice!

subtitles.original: 届けるぜ。そうだね、じゃあ四人で届けていきましょうか
subtitles.english: Deliver it. That's right, so let's deliver it with the four of us.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: それでは聞いてください。secret base ～君がくれたもの～
subtitles.english: Now, please listen. secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~.

subtitles.original: secret base ～君がくれたもの～ 作詞・作曲 町田 紀彦
subtitles.english: secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~ / Lyrics & Music: Norihiko Machida

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり　将来の夢
subtitles.english: You and the end of summer, our dreams for the future

subtitles.original: 大きな希望　忘れない
subtitles.english: Those big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月　また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: Believing that we'll meet again in August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を…
subtitles.english: Our best memories...

subtitles.original: 出会いはふっとした瞬間に
subtitles.english: Our meeting was at a sudden moment

subtitles.original: 帰り道の交差点で
subtitles.english: At the intersection on the way home

subtitles.original: 声をかけてくれたね　「一緒に帰ろう」
subtitles.english: You called out to me, "Let's go home together"

subtitles.original: 僕は照れくさそうに　カバンで顔隠しながら
subtitles.english: Embarrassed, I hid my face with my bag

subtitles.original: 本当はとってもとっても嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: But actually, I was very, very happy

subtitles.original: あぁ　花火が夜空　綺麗に咲いて　ちょっと切なく
subtitles.english: Ah, the fireworks bloomed beautifully in the night sky, feeling a bit bittersweet

subtitles.original: あぁ　風が時間と共に流れる
subtitles.english: Ah, the wind flows along with time

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて　楽しくて　冒険も色々したね
subtitles.english: So happy, so fun, we went on many adventures

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり　将来の夢　大きな希望　忘れない
subtitles.english: You and the end of summer, our dreams for the future, those big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月　また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: Believing that we'll meet again in August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から　「ありがとう」叫んでたこと知ってたよ
subtitles.english: I knew you were shouting "Thank you" from the bottom of your heart until the end

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて　笑顔でさよなら　切ないよね
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile, it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を…
subtitles.english: Our best memories...

subtitles.original: あぁ　夏休みも　あと少しで終わっちゃうから
subtitles.english: Ah, because summer vacation is almost over

subtitles.original: あぁ　太陽と月　仲良くして
subtitles.english: Ah, sun and moon, get along well

subtitles.original: 悲しくて　寂しくて　喧嘩も色々したね
subtitles.english: So sad, so lonely, we had many fights, too

subtitles.original: 二人の秘密基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から　「ありがとう」叫んでたこと知ってたよ
subtitles.english: I knew you were shouting "Thank you" from the bottom of your heart until the end

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて　笑顔でさよなら　切ないよね
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile, it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を…
subtitles.english: Our best memories...

subtitles.original: 突然の…
subtitles.english: The sudden...

subtitles.original: 転校で…
subtitles.english: ...transfer...

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく…
subtitles.english: ...that there was nothing we could do...
